item.title: Uarr
item.description: Code Coming Soon Slides Description Microarray technology has for many years remained a golden standard in transcriptomics. However, preparation of physical slides in wet labs involves procedures which tend to introduce occasional dirt and noise into the slide. Having to repeat experiments due to environmental noise present in the scanned images leads to increased reagent and labor costs. In this work we explore denoising methods in the narrow subfield of microarray image analysis.

item.title: Kalash
item.description: Link Description Kalash is a simple test runner built for large-scale test automation which relies on a simple YAML-based configuration or Python file configuration. Made for test automation at Technica Engineering GmbH.
